title: Ashley Graham beams showing off her baby bump in black dress at NYC screening of The Morning Show
text:
Ashley Graham was a vision of beauty and glamour at the screening of The Morning Show at New York City's David Geffen Hall.

'So excited for that onscreen drama,' the 31-year-old beauty said in an Instagram Stories post. 'We out here supporting' Jennifer Aniston and Reese Witherspoon, two stars of the Apple TV dramatic comedy.

The Lincoln, Nebraska native donned a long-sleeved black dress with a turtleneck and black strappy heels to the Gotham event.

Gorgeous: Ashley Graham, 31, was a vision of beauty and glamour at the screening of The Morning Show at New York City's David Geffen Hall Monday

The supermodel, who is expecting her first child with her husband, cinematographer Justin Ervin, had her brown tresses elegantly styled into a bun and accessorized with silver hoop earrings at the industry gathering.

The Sports Illustrated alum wore a complementary layer of makeup on the autumn evening at the screening, which was also attended by Aniston and Witherspoon, as well as Mindy Kaling, Wendy Williams, Gayle King and Emmy Rossum.

Graham was feted for her Halloween costume over the weekend, as she dressed up like Jessica Rabbit from the 1988 film Who Framed Roger Rabbit?

Her husband Ervin also channeled the late 80s as the late pro wrestler 'Macho Man' Randy Savage.

Expecting: The mom-to-be cupped her baby bump at the NYC premiere

Stylish: The Lincoln, Nebraska native donned a long-sleeved black dress with a turtleneck and black strappy heels to the Gotham event

Glam: The Sports Illustrated alum wore a complementary layer of makeup on the autumn evening

Graham said in an Instagram post, 'Macho Man knocked up Jessica Rabbit for Halloween.

Graham in August revealed she was expecting in a clip on the social media site alongside her spouse in which they revealed the baby bum and said, 'Surprise!'

She wrote in the caption: 'Nine years ago today, I married the love of my life It has been the best journey with my favorite person in the world! Today, we are feeling so blessed, grateful and excited to celebrate with our GROWING FAMILY! Happy anniversary, @mrjustinervin. Life is about to get even better.'

Adorable: Graham in August revealed she was expecting in a clip on the social media site alongside her spouse in which they revealed the baby bump and said, 'Surprise!'

Happy: The model looked to be in a wonderful mood at the star-studded screening

Anticipation: Ashley said in an Instagram Stories post from the screening, 'So excited for that onscreen dramaaa'
description: The Lincoln, Nebraska native donned a long-sleeved black dress with a turtleneck and black strappy heels to the Gotham event.
